About me

Let me tell you a few things about myself.

BIO

I'm Laura Vikström from Oulu. I'm graduating next spring from University of Applied Sciences with business information systems degree. I own strong analytical and problem solving skills. I am on my best with front end developing but my strong suit is also doing visual work, for example animations.

I've categorized my knowledge into

My IT work
My other work
My studies
My IT work

Verohallinto - Finnish Tax Administration

Subject matter expert in test automation

I monitored and administrated test automation tests and investigated if some test was failing. Part of my job also was to improve the test automation so that the tests run faster and they are more extensive.

I was in charge of what new tests are taken to test automation and co-operated with that field's subject matter expert.

Verohallinto - Finnish Tax Administration

Tester in test automation

I wrote and tested new or failed test automation tests to make sure they work. I made corrections to current tests. I reported the fails when there were some.

Being tester in test automation required large understanding of the subjects under testing but also about automation and how the test scripts are written.

Verohallinto - Finnish Tax Administration

System tester

I tested service requests of new or corrected functionatilies. I wrote the test scenarios and tested them. Reported the fails if there were some.

The job required large understanding of the subjects under testing since the test scenarios were written by me.

My other work

Verohallinto - Finnish Tax Administration

Customer Advisor / Senior Tax Clerk

Customer service in different channels: phone service, chat and messages, face to face in self-service area, when customer took a queue number and when customer had booked an appointment.

I also handled claim for adjustments, lead working group and took part in events to go and tell about taxation.

I served customers in Finnish and English.

Dressmann Oy, Novia Oy, DNA Oy

Sales

I was in sales in all of the companies. In the last two my job description was to contact current and new customers to sell phone and internet services and devices. In the first one my job was to serve customers face to face in the store.

My studies

Oulu University of Applied Sciences

Business Information Systems
2021 - 2023

Business information systems will have versatile ICT knowledge and skills including programming skills and ability top development digital products and services for business organisations. Examples of digital products and services are games, company web-sites, e-commerce sites and services, social media applications, mobile services and IoT-technology based services.

Project type of working and the newest frontend-technologies are used for developing digital products and services. The graduates can work in various positions within the ICT field. All professions are requiring skills for logical thinking and problem solving.

— OAMK, Degree Programme in Business Information Systems

Oulu University of Applied Sciences

Business Economics, option of law and administration
2015 - 2018

The aim of the programme is to prepare students for work in expert and managerial positions, and for work as independent entrepreneurs in assignments that require judicial and commercial expertise. Some of the students carry out their work placement in these judicial administration offices.

The students are offered an opportunity to get a closer look at how work is done in justice courts, legal advice centres and at prosecution and execution offices. Some of the students carry out their work placement in these judicial administration offices.

— OAMK, Degree Programme in Business Economics, Option of Law and Administration
